hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Regulatory News Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes with positive regulatory catalyst (MiCA implementation, ETF approval news, etc.), if BTC breaks above 20-day high within 2 days of news on volume >2x average, there's 75% probability of transition to BULL regime within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity removes uncertainty premium and attracts institutional capital. Neutral regimes lack direction; positive catalysts provide fundamental justification for breakout. High volume confirms institutional participation rather than retail speculation.
entry_conditions: Major positive regulatory catalyst occurs (verified by news sentiment score >0.7)
BTC breaks above 20-day high within 2 trading days of catalyst
Crypto Fear & Greed Index rises >10 points in 2 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to BULL (confidence > 70%) OR BTC gains +10% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price falls back below 20-day high OR volume on follow-through days < 0.8x average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 55% of regulatory breakouts sustain into BULL regimes OR news gets 'sold' (>60% of breakouts fail within 3 days).
